Reason:The user's goal is to block messages from unknown and hidden numbers. The user has navigated to the "Manage blocked numbers" screen. On this screen, there are options to "Block messages from not stored contacts" and "Block messages from hidden numbers". However, the checkboxes next to these options are not checked. The text "You are not blocking anyone" also indicates that no blocking is currently active. Therefore, the user has not yet completed the goal of blocking messages from unknown and hidden numbers.
